EmailTemplate.subject: Step Forward: Apply now to win an iPad mini!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Competition time!
Apply now to be in with a chance to win an iPad Mini!
Congratulations, you have already taken the first steps towards securing your future by filling out an expression of interest form, but the next step means filling in an application form online and if you do it over the Christmas holidays, you'll also be in with a chance to win an iPad Mini!
Thinking about taking a gap year? Need some help finding work? Bit unsure about what to do after Sixth Form or College? Step Forward could be for you.
Well, what can Step Forward do for you?
Those who are selected and graduate from Step Forward will have:
- Completed 12 months of full time work with a high quality employer
- Received a salary of Â£9,000
- A nationally recognised qualification equivalent to an A-level
- Developed essential skills that employers look for such as teamwork, leadership and problem solving
- Received support from their own professional mentor to get the most of the year and beyond
- Shared their experience with other likeminded people and formed lasting friendships
Places are limited so if you want to be considered for Step Forward and be in our draw to win an iPad Mini, take the next step by completing our Application form online by midnight on Monday 5th January. Apply with your unique application form Here.
Remember to like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information and hear about our Competition winner!
Best of luck with your application! If you are successful, you will hear from us by the end of 6th February 2015 and we hope to see you at the Step Forward assessment in February half-term!
Charlotte Hobson
Head of Step Forward Associate Recruitment
